bill.summary: 2/25/1993--Introduced. Career Pathways Act of 1993 - Amends the Job Training Partnership Act to establish school-to-work transition Career Pathways (CP) programs for all students. Authorizes appropriations. Directs the Secretary of Labor (the Secretary) to award grants to: (1) eligible partnerships for CP programs; (2) States for statewide CP systems; and (3) an industry or trade association or a labor union for an industry- or occupation-wide CP program.
